mapper.select: SELECT b.class_no, b.class_name, b.start_date, b.end_date, c.schedule_no, c.schedule_name, c.start_date, c.end_date, d.test_no, d.test_dt, d.cutline, IFNULL(e.score, 0) AS score FROM tbl_user_class a LEFT JOIN tbl_class b ON a.class_no = b.class_no LEFT JOIN tbl_schedule c ON b.class_no = c.class_no LEFT JOIN tbl_test d ON c.schedule_no = d.schedule_no LEFT JOIN tbl_score e ON d.test_no = e.test_no WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.graduate_code != 'APPLY' GROUP BY a.class_no, b.class_no, c.schedule_no, e.score
